title: Balloon Inflation Simulator
description: An interactive simulation that helps students compare how the rate of radius change varies with different radii and volume flow rates, discovering the inverse relationship dr/dt = (dV/dt) / (4 pi r squared).
creator: Claude Code
subject: Mathematics
Calculus
Related Rates
learningObjectives: Compare how dr/dt varies with different radii
Analyze the inverse square relationship between dr/dt and r
Discover why constant volume flow doesn't mean constant radius growth
Connect surface area to rate of radius change

controls.label: dV/dt (volume flow rate)
controls.description: Controls the rate at which air flows into the balloon

controls.label: Animation Speed
controls.description: Controls the speed of the simulation

controls.label: Play/Pause

controls.label: Reset
controls.description: Reset the simulation to initial state
